text: Laxmi Narayan Mandir is a Hindu temple, devoted to Laxmi, the Hindu goddess of wealth. It is located at 31 Nawabpur Road in Dhaka, Bangladesh. The temple is about 300 years old. It was established in the Bengali year of 1056. Category:Hindu temples in Bangladesh Category:Dhaka
title: Laxmi Narayan Mandir, Dhaka
